description: This file defines a script that creates an agent for interacting with OpenAI's chat model, specifically for generating audio responses to prompts and saving the resulting audio files.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with OpenAI models to generate responses.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from the agent, including audio content.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a text response from the agent.
